Composite.name: C053
Composite.comment: To identify the EDI standard, version, release and any applicable industry guideline

Field.name: ElectronicFormStandardsTypeCode
Field.comment: Code identifying the standard type being transferred using the electronic form

Field.name: ElectronicFormStandardsIdentifier
Field.comment: The coded identification of the applicable electronic business transaction

Field.name: ImplementationConventionReference
Field.comment: Reference assigned to identify Implementation Convention

Field.name: VersionIdentifier
Field.comment: Revision level of a particular format, program, technique or algorithm

Field.name: RevisionValue
Field.comment: Revision or engineering change level of the data items referred to by the specification number
